subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Details have emerged that Bill Bell, a former Mississippi State player, told the N.C.A.A. that he received a text message from Kenny Rogers, who has financial ties to an N.F.L. agent, requesting payments for Cam Newton to play.
snippet: Details have emerged that Bill Bell, a former Mississippi State player, told the N.C.A.A. that he received a text message from Kenny Rogers, who has financial ties to an N.F.L. agent, requesting payments for Cam Newton to play.
